scenes.background: Bob nods and glances at you for support. Monica looks exasperated.
scenes.description: Bob sighs and says, 'Should we just vote on this?'

options.text: A vote might be a fair way to decide.
options.analysis: You suggested a democratic approach, showing good perception and social skills, but empathy and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: Maybe we can take some more time to discuss before deciding.
options.analysis: You showed empathy and self-regulation by suggesting more discussion, but perception and social skill were moderate.

options.text: A vote might be premature; let's explore other options first.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the need for more options, showing good social skill and motivation, but empathy, perception, and self-regulation were moderate.
